name: Play Cube with Uncle Billy
description: Experience the different of cube game
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1/Windows 10(64-bit versions only) Processor: Just need one cpu Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 256 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 8.1/Windows 10(64-bit versions only) Processor: Intel Core i9-7980XE | AMD Threadripper 1950X Memory: 64 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA TITAN V DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1024 GB available space
